author: Connie Loizos
title: As the U.S. shuts down, StockX’s business is booming, says its CEO
description: StockX, the high-flying resale marketplace that connects buyers and sellers of sneakers, streetwear, handbags and other collectible items who agree on pricing, has seen its fortune rise along with the $6 billion global sneaker resale market, which is part of …
